meanings.sent1: The town was full of snollygosters who would do anything for money.
meanings.sent2: Beware of the snollygosters in the business world who may try to deceive you.
meanings.sent3: The snollygosters at the carnival were always looking for ways to trick unsuspecting visitors.
meanings.sent4: In the world of politics, some leaders are like snollygosters, always seeking personal gain.
meanings.sent5: The image of a snollygoster is that of a cunning and deceitful individual.

meanings.definition: To behave in a shrewd or unprincipled manner.
meanings.sent1: He tends to snollygosters his way through negotiations to get what he wants.
meanings.sent2: She snollygosters her opponents by using clever tactics in the game.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to snollygosters its way into getting extra treats from its owner.
meanings.sent4: The fox snollygosters its prey by luring them with false promises.
meanings.sent5: When faced with a difficult decision, he often chooses to snollygosters his way out of trouble.
